Author: karentakethekids
Text: Closely watch them first before acussing them of an eating disorder. Look how they are doing mentally. Once you believe that this person meets the basic criteria of an eating disorder adress then just adress it in a non accusing way. Start maybe with "Hey are you ok/ you dont seem well/ your behaviour worries me" Now, i dont know in what relations you are with this person, but if it not somebody you could influence, hence it is a coworker/ friend, then be prepared to not do anything. You cant force anybody into recovery, if its your child/ so / sibling then maybe you will have a shot but otherwise if u will place yourself between the person and their disorder they will cut you out immidietly.
